name: Nucleus B
description:
Survive from electrons shot by the nucleus.

Collect photons to earn points.

Controls :

K to change keyboard layout (AZERTY or QWERTY) in title menu (QWERTY by default).

W, A, S, D to navigate in menus (Z, Q, S, D in AZERTY).

E or SPACE to confirm.

KONAMI code (with arrows) in title menu to unlock all levels !

Made with Unity, Photoshop & After Effects

Credits :

  • Background music from "Ultimate Game Music Collection" Unity assets pack (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/ultimate-game-music...)
  • FX Sounds from "Universal Sound FX" Unity assets pack (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/universal-sound-fx-17256)

Created in T1 2021
